feed.title: Google Cloud: Google SecOps Marketplace
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Google SecOps Marketplace

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 41.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Update Alert

  • The following new connector has been added:

  • SentinelOne - Alert Connector

  • A new predefined widget has been added to the following action:

  • Update Alert
entry.summary: Version 41.0 of SentinelOne brings new capabilities, including an 'Update Alert' action and a 'SentinelOne - Alert Connector'.
entry.title: Feature: New Features in SentinelOne V41.0

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 4.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Set DTM Alert Analysis
entry.summary: Google Threat Intelligence 4.0 introduces a new action: Set DTM Alert Analysis.
entry.title: Feature: New DTM Alert Analysis Feature

entry.content:
Palo Alto Cortex XDR: Version 18.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Add Comment To Incident

  • Execute XQL Search
  • Get Incident Details
entry.summary: The latest version of Palo Alto Cortex XDR (18.0) introduces powerful new incident management capabilities, including the ability to add comments, execute XQL searches, and retrieve detailed incident information.
entry.title: Feature: Palo Alto Cortex XDR - New Actions

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 4.0

  • Updated the processing of the threat actor entity in the following action:

  • Enrich Entities

  • Updated the predefined widget in the following actions:

(REGRESSIVE) The widget now works with GTI information. To see the changes, the widget must be re-added to the existing views in playbooks.

  • Enrich Entities
  • Enrich IOCs

  • Added JSON samples to the following action:

  • Enrich Entities
entry.summary: Google Threat Intelligence has been updated to version 4.0. This update includes changes to the processing of threat actor entities and updates to predefined widgets in the Enrich Entities and Enrich IOCs actions. JSON samples have also been added to the Enrich Entities action.
entry.title: Changed: Google Threat Intelligence Update

entry.content:
Trend Vision One: Version 6.0

  • Added support for Agent UUID in the following actions:

  • Enrich Entities

  • Execute Custom Script
  • Isolate Endpoint
  • Unisolate Endpoint
entry.summary: Version 6.0 of Trend Vision One introduces Agent UUID support for key actions like Enrich Entities, Execute Custom Script, Isolate Endpoint, and Unisolate Endpoint.
entry.title: Changed: Trend Vision One 6.0 Update

entry.content:
Splunk: Version 58.0

  • Updated the alert processing logic in the following connector:

  • Splunk ES - Notable Events Connector
entry.summary: Version 58.0 of the Splunk connector includes updated alert processing logic for the Splunk ES Notable Events Connector.
entry.title: Changed: Splunk ES Notable Events Connector Alert Processing Updated

entry.content:
Jira: Version 48.0

  • Integration: Updated the SDK version.
entry.summary: The SDK version has been updated in version 48.0.
entry.title: Changed: SDK Version Update

entry.content:
Added the ability to modify the API Root and Login API Root in the following integrations:

  • Azure Active Directory: Version 18.0
  • Azure AD Identity Protection: Version 7.0
  • Microsoft Teams: Version 28.0
entry.summary: The API Root and Login API Root can now be modified in Azure Active Directory v18.0, Azure AD Identity Protection v7.0, and Microsoft Teams v28.0.
entry.title: Changed: API Root and Login API Root Modifications

entry.content:
Vertex AI: Version 4.0

  • Integration: Increased the default timeout for API requests.
entry.summary: Vertex AI version 4.0 increases the default timeout for API requests.
entry.title: Changed: Vertex AI Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Azure Sentinel: Version 56.0

  • Updated mapping for the ScheduledAlert event types in the following connector:

  • Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2
entry.summary: A new version (56.0) of Microsoft Azure Sentinel is available. This update includes changes to the Scheduled Alert event types mapping for the Incident Connector v2.
entry.title: Changed: Azure Sentinel Update

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 3.0

  • Extended supported filters in the following connector:

  • Google Threat Intelligence - ASM Issues Connector
entry.summary: Version 3.0 of Google Threat Intelligence is now available, featuring extended supported filters in the ASM Issues Connector.
entry.title: Changed: Google Threat Intelligence Update

entry.content:
Google Workspace: Version 20.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Block Extension

  • Delete Extension
  • Get Extension Details
  • Get Host Browser Details
  • Search User Activity Events
entry.summary: Google Workspace V20.0 introduces new actions: Block Extension, Delete Extension, Get Extension Details, Get Host Browser Details, and Search User Activity Events.
entry.title: Feature: New Actions in Google Workspace

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 3.0

  • Integration: Updated authentication flow.
entry.summary: Google Threat Intelligence has been updated to version 3.0 with a new authentication flow.
entry.title: Changed: Google Threat Intelligence v3.0

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 63.0

  • Updated processing of On-Demand Scan alerts in the following connector:

  • Crowdstrike Falcon - Alerts Connector
entry.summary: CrowdStrike Falcon v6.3.0: Updated processing for On-Demand Scan alerts in the Crowdstrike Falcon - Alerts Connector.
entry.title: Changed: CrowdStrike Falcon Update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 64.0

  • Added support for aggregated searches in the following action:

  • Execute UDM Query
entry.summary: Added support for aggregated searches in the Execute UDM Query action.
entry.title: Changed: Chronicle V64.0 Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 30.0

  • Improved handling of Case Name Template in the following connector:

  • Microsoft Graph Mail - Microsoft Graph Mail Connector
entry.summary: Version 30.0 of Microsoft Graph Mail has improved handling of Case Name Template in its connector.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Graph Mail Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated: Version 6.0

  • Improved handling of Case Name Template in the following connector:

  • Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated - Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated Connector
entry.summary: Improved handling of Case Name Template.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated V6.0

entry.content: New CyberArk Credential Provider integration
entry.summary: CyberArk Credential Provider integration.
entry.title: Feature: CyberArk Credential Provider integration

entry.content:
Jira: Version 47.0

  • Updated timestamp processing logic in the following jobs:

  • Sync Comments

  • Sync Closure

  • Updated logic for processing closed tickets in the following job:

  • Sync Closure
entry.summary: Timestamp processing logic updated for Sync Comments and Sync Closure jobs. Logic for closed tickets also updated in the Sync Closure job.
entry.title: Changed: Updated timestamp processing and closure logic in Version 47.0

entry.content:
Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 29.0

  • Integration: Updated dependencies.
entry.summary: Updated dependencies for Microsoft Graph Mail v29.0.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Graph Mail v29.0 Update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 63.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Ask Gemini

  • Enrich Entities
entry.summary: New features in Google Chronicle v63.0 include Ask Gemini and Enrich Entities.
entry.title: Feature: Google Chronicle v63.0 Update

entry.content:
Case Federation: Version 4.0

  • Integration: Refactored the code.
entry.summary: Refactored code for Case Federation v4.0.
entry.title: Changed: Case Federation v4.0 Update

entry.content:
Gmail: Version 5.0

  • Integration: Improved error handling.
entry.summary: Improved error handling in Gmail v5.0.
entry.title: Changed: Gmail v5.0 Update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 63.0

  • The following actions have been deprecated:

  • Enrich Domain

  • Enrich IP
entry.summary: Deprecated actions: Enrich Domain, Enrich IP.
entry.title: Changed: Google Chronicle v63.0 Changes

entry.content:
QRadar: Version 60.0

  • Updated offense processing logic in the following connector:

  • Qradar - Baseline Offenses Connector
entry.summary: Version 60.0 of QRadar has been released with updated offense processing logic.
entry.title: Changed: QRadar 60.0 Update

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 40.0

  • Added ability to fetch agent information in the following actions:

  • Disconnect Agent From Network

  • Enrich Endpoint
  • Get Agent Status
  • Get Application List For Endpoint
  • Get Events For Endpoint Hours Back
  • Initiate Full Scan
  • Move Agents
  • Reconnect Agent To The Network
entry.summary: Agent information fetching enabled in multiple actions.
entry.title: Changed: SentinelOneV2 Update

entry.content:
Siemplify: Version 94.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Get Custom Field Values

  • Resume Case SLA
  • Pause Case SLA
entry.summary: New actions: Get Custom Field Values, Resume Case SLA, and Pause Case SLA.
entry.title: Feature: Siemplify Version 94.0 Update

entry.content:
Sophos: Version 18.0

Added ability to work with new authentication method in the following action:

  • Get Events Log
entry.summary: Sophos Version 18.0: Added ability to work with new authentication method in Get Events Log.
entry.title: Changed: Sophos 18.0 Update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 62.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Remove Rows From Data Table

  • Get Data Tables
  • Is Value In Data Table
  • Add Rows To Data Table
entry.summary: New actions have been added to Google Chronicle, version 62.0. These include 'Remove Rows From Data Table', 'Get Data Tables', 'Is Value In Data Table', and 'Add Rows To Data Table'.
entry.title: Feature: Google Chronicle Version 62.0 Feature Update

entry.content:
Azure Security Center: Version 11.0

  • Integration: Refactored the integration code to support the updated API.
entry.summary: The Azure Security Center has been updated to version 11.0. This update includes refactored integration code to support the updated API.
entry.title: Changed: Azure Security Center Update to Version 11.0

entry.content:
Mandiant Threat Intelligence: Version 14.0

  • Improved entity processing logic in the following action:

  • Enrich Entities
entry.summary: This update improves the logic for processing entities within the Enrich Entities action.
entry.title: Changed: Mandiant Threat Intelligence Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Azure Sentinel: Version 55.0

  • Updated logger initialization in the following connector:

  • Microsoft Azure Sentinel - Incident Connector v2
entry.summary: The Microsoft Azure Sentinel Incident Connector v2 has been updated with changes to its logger initialization.
entry.title: Changed: Azure Sentinel Connector Update

entry.content:
MySQL: Version 5.0

  • Refined query processing in the following action:

  • Run SQL Query
entry.summary: We've updated MySQL to version 5.0, which includes refinements to query processing for the Run SQL Query action.
entry.title: Changed: MySQL 5.0 Update

entry.content:
BMC Remedy ITSM: Version 9.0

  • Updated input parameter processing in the following action:

  • Create Incident
entry.summary: The Create Incident action in BMC Remedy ITSM version 9.0 has updated input parameter processing.
entry.title: Changed: BMC Remedy ITSM: Create Incident Update

entry.content:
ServiceNow: Version 58.0

  • Updated processing of record object in the following connector:

  • ServiceNow - ServiceNow Connector
entry.summary: The ServiceNow connector version 58.0 has been updated to improve the processing of record objects.
entry.title: Changed: ServiceNow Connector Update

entry.content:
Siemplify: Version 93.0

  • Updated action logic in the following actions:

  • Get Case Details

  • Get Similar Cases
entry.summary: Version 93.0 of Siemplify has been released, featuring updated action logic for "Get Case Details" and "Get Similar Cases".
entry.title: Changed: Siemplify v93.0: Updated Action Logic

entry.content:
Okta: Version 9.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Send SSF to Okta
entry.summary: New feature: Send SSF to Okta. This action integrates with Okta version 9.0.
entry.title: Feature: Okta: Send SSF action added

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 62.0

  • Updated JSON Result structure in the following action:

  • List Hosts
entry.summary: The CrowdStrike Falcon integration has been updated to version 62.0. This version includes changes to the JSON result structure for the List Hosts action.
entry.title: Changed: CrowdStrike Falcon Integration Updated

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 61.0

  • Updated action processing logic in the following action:

  • Execute UDM Query
entry.summary: The "Execute UDM Query" action in Google Chronicle has been updated with changes to its action processing logic.
entry.title: Changed: Google Chronicle: Action Processing Logic Updated

entry.content:
Vertex AI: Version 3.0

  • Integration: Updated the handling of non-Google models.
entry.summary: Vertex AI Version 3.0 now better handles non-Google models.
entry.title: Changed: Vertex AI 3.0 Update

entry.content:
Siemplify: Version 92.0

  • Updated action logic in the following actions:

  • Get Case Details

  • Get Similar Cases
  • Update Case Description
entry.summary: Version 92.0 of Siemplify includes updated action logic for 'Get Case Details', 'Get Similar Cases', and 'Update Case Description'.
entry.title: Changed: Siemplify Version 92.0 Updates

entry.content:
Refactored the code to work with updated API in the following integrations:

  • Case Federation: Version 3.0
  • Siemplify: Version 91.0
entry.summary: The code has been refactored to support the updated APIs for Case Federation v3.0 and Siemplify v91.0.
entry.title: Changed: Code refactored for updated APIs

entry.content:
Microsoft Azure Sentinel: Version 54.0

  • Added an ability to not process the alert until Scheduled/NRT alert objects are available from API in the following connectors:

  • Microsoft Azure Sentinel - Incident Connector v2

  • Microsoft Azure Sentinel - Incident Tracking Connector
entry.summary: The Microsoft Azure Sentinel has been updated to version 54.0. This update includes an enhancement to the Incident Connector v2 and Incident Tracking Connector, allowing them to avoid processing alerts until the necessary Scheduled/NRT alert objects are available from the API.
entry.title: Changed: Azure Sentinel Update to Version 54.0

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 39.0

  • Updated ontology mapping in the following connector:

  • SentinelOneV2 - Threats Connector
entry.summary: The SentinelOneV2 connector has been updated to version 39.0, including changes to the ontology mapping for the Threats Connector.
entry.title: Changed: SentinelOneV2 Update to Version 39.0

entry.content:
Siemplify: Version 91.0

  • Updated Predefined Widget in the following action:

  • Get Similar Cases
entry.summary: Version 91.0 of Siemplify includes an update to the Predefined Widget for the "Get Similar Cases" action.
entry.title: Changed: Siemplify Version 91.0 Update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 60.0

  • Updated risk score handling in the following connector:

  • Google Chronicle - Alerts Connector
entry.summary: The Google Chronicle - Alerts Connector has been updated to enhance risk score handling in version 60.0.
entry.title: Changed: Google Chronicle Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Teams: Version 27.0

  • Integration: Refactored the code to work with updated API.
entry.summary: The Microsoft Teams app has been updated to version 27.0. This update includes refactored code to ensure compatibility with the latest API.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Teams Update to Version 27.0

entry.content: New Akamai integration
entry.summary: A new integration with Akamai is now available, enhancing our platform's capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: New Akamai Integration

entry.content: New Google Threat Intelligence integration
entry.summary: A new integration with Google Threat Intelligence is now available.
entry.title: Feature: New Google Threat Intelligence Integration

entry.content:
Darktrace: Version 18.0

  • Added ability to filter model breaches by priority in the following connector:

  • Darktrace - Model Breaches Connector
entry.summary: The Darktrace connector now supports filtering model breaches by priority.
entry.title: Changed: Darktrace Connector Update

entry.content:
Refactored the code to work with updated API in the following integrations:

  • Exchange: Version 113.0
  • ServiceNow: Version 57.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated: Version 5.0

Refactored the code in the following integrations:

  • Gmail: Version 4.0
  • Google Cloud API: Version 6.0
  • HTTP v2: Version 9.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 28.0
  • Tor: Version 7.0
entry.summary: The code has been refactored to support updated APIs in Exchange (v113.0), ServiceNow (v57.0), and Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated (v5.0). Additionally, refactoring was done for Gmail (v4.0), Google Cloud API (v6.0), HTTP v2 (v9.0), Microsoft Graph Mail (v28.0), and Tor (v7.0).
entry.title: Changed: Code refactoring for updated API integrations

entry.content:
Refactored the code to work with updated API in the following integrations:

  • BMC Remedy ITSM: Version 8.0
  • Gmail: Version 3.0
  • Google Cloud API: Version 5.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 27.0
  • Service Desk Plus V3: Version 6.0
  • Vertex AI: Version 2.0
entry.summary: The code has been refactored to support the latest API versions for BMC Remedy ITSM v8.0, Gmail v3.0, Microsoft Graph Mail v27.0, Service Desk Plus v3 v6.0, and Vertex AI v2.0.
entry.title: Changed: Code Refactored for Updated Integrations

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 59.0

  • Updated the API root to be configurable in IDE in the following connector:
  • Google Chronicle - Chronicle Alerts Connector
entry.summary: The Chronicle Alerts Connector now allows configuring the API root in IDE.
entry.title: Changed: Chronicle Alerts Connector API Root Updated

entry.content:
Nmap: Version 2.0

  • Updated JSON Result structure in the following action:
  • Scan Entities
entry.summary: Nmap has been updated to version 2.0. This release includes changes to the Scan Entities action, specifically an updated JSON result structure.
entry.title: Changed: Nmap 2.0 Released

entry.content:
Vertex AI: Version 2.0

  • Fixed non-Google models that weren't working
entry.summary: Vertex AI 2.0 is now available. This update includes fixes for non-Google models.
entry.title: Changed: Vertex AI 2.0 Released
